roleset.name: make lively, giving new life
roleset.note: REVITALIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'revitalize' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.1. (from revitalize.01-v predicate notes)
REVITALIZATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from revitalization.01-n)

example.name: the one example
example.text: [The National Association of Broadcasters]-1 in June adopted an agenda for *trace*-1 revitalizing AM radio that includes, among other things, pursuing further FCC action on selecting an AM stereo standard and seeking a law requiring all stereo receivers to include AM stereo.
